name: 90s Character IDs Part 1 Quiz | Name the Movie | 10 Questions

questions.correct: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion
questions.explanation:
Romy and Michele's High School Reunion.

	Lisa Kudrow played this back brace girl.

Dazed and Confused.

	Jason London can also be seen in "Too Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything, Julie Newmar".

Kingpin.

	Woody Harrelson plays this one-handed bowler.

Mermaids.

	Winona Ryder in this 1990 hit movie.

Twister.

	Of course this would be Helen Hunt's wild ride.

Matilda.

	Danny DeVito also narrated this movie.

The Cutting Edge.

	D.B. Sweeney as a hockey player/ice skater.

Face/Off.

	Nicolas Cage and John Travolta star in this action pack movie.  John Travolta's character name was Sean Archer.
